description: I'm a Master's student in Project Management at Northeastern University focusing on optimizing Business Analysis. I'm dedicated to becoming a future leader in the field.
detailOrQuote: I am a dedicated graduate student currently pursuing a Master's degree in Project Management at Northeastern University, Boston. With experience in Commercial operations and Supply Chain optimization, I am certified in Project Management by Harvard Business Publishing, bringing a unique blend of skills including effective order management and impactful leadership. My internships at Greenko Group provided valuable insights into Supply Chain Management, Commercial billing processes, and Human Resources practices. Alongside my academic pursuits, I have represented Telangana at the Central Hall of Parliament and actively participated in Model United Nations, demonstrating exceptional leadership and communication abilities. With a strong foundation in Project Management and a track record of success, I am poised to make significant contributions in my field.
